at.ac.tuwien.infosys.jcloudscale.migration.utility

Class MigrationUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.tuwien.infosys.jcloudscale.migration.utility.MigrationUtil

  • public class MigrationUtil
extends Object
    Provides helper methods for working with CloudObject's annotations and for migrating CloudObjects.

      • resetCache

        public static void resetCache()

      • checkLegalMigrationDef

        public static void checkLegalMigrationDef(Class<?> clazz)
                                   throws IllegalDefinitionException
        Checks if all migration-specific annotations are used correctly (if any).
        Parameters:
        clazz - The cloud object type to check
        Throws:
        IllegalDefinitionException - If the given class doesn't comply to migration requirements
        NullPointerException - If the given class is null

      • isNoMigrate

        public static boolean isNoMigrate(Class<?> clazz)
        Checks if the given class is marked to be not considered in migration decisions.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class to check
        Returns:
        true or false
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If the given class is null

      • getSerializationProvider

        public static ISerializationProvider getSerializationProvider(Class<?> clazz)
                                                       throws InstantiationException,
                                                              InvocationTargetException,
                                                              IllegalAccessException,
                                                              NoSuchMethodException
        Returns the ISerializationProvider implementation class object specified for the given class using the SerializationProvider annotation.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class to scan for.
        Returns:
        The implementation class object specified or DefaultSerializationProvider if the annotation is missing.
        Throws:
        InstantiationException
        InvocationTargetException
        IllegalAccessException
        NoSuchMethodException

      • getSortedPreMigrate

        public static List<Method> getSortedPreMigrate(Class<?> clazz)
        Scans the given class for methods annotated with PreMigration and orders them by their priority
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class to scan
        Returns:
        A sorted set with methods or an empty set if the class has no annotated methods

      • getSortedPostMigrate

        public static List<Method> getSortedPostMigrate(Class<?> clazz)
        Scans the given class for methods annotated with PostMigration and orders them by their priority
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class to scan
        Returns:
        A sorted set with methods or an empty set if the class has no annotated methods

      • getTransientFields

        public static Set<Field> getTransientFields(Class<?> clazz)
        Scans the given class for fields annotated with MigrationTransient
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class to scan
        Returns:
        A set of fields

      • getNonTransientFields

        public static Set<Field> getNonTransientFields(Class<?> clazz)
        Scans the class for fields NOT annotated with MigrationTransient
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class to scan
        Returns:
        A set of fields

      • getJCloudScaleFields

        public static Set<Field> getJCloudScaleFields(Class<?> clazz)
        Scans the class for fields annotated with JCloudScale-specific annotations
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class to scan
        Returns:
        A set of fields
        See Also:
        CloudObjectId, CloudInvocationInfos, EventSink

      • resetFields

        public static void resetFields(Object cloudObject,
               Set<Field> fields)
                        throws Exception
        Resets all given complex-type fields to null, so that the object can be serialized
        Parameters:
        cloudObject - The cloudObject which fields should be reseted
        fields - The fields to reset
        Throws:
        Exception - If an exception occurs

      • initTransientFields

        public static void initTransientFields(Object cloudObject,
                       Set<Field> fields)
                                throws IllegalAccessException,
                                       InstantiationException,
                                       NullPointerException
        Initializes all complex type fields of an CloudObject annotated with MigrationTransient. Primitive fields are set to their declared initialization value. Complex type fields are initialized with a new instance of the class specified in MigrationTransient.initialize() or their declared initialization value if there's nothing specified
        Parameters:
        cloudObject - The CloudObject to initialize.
        fields - The fields to initialize.
        Throws:
        IllegalAccessException - If the fields which should be initialized couldn't be accessed
        InstantiationException - If a complex field couldn't be initialized
        NullPointerException - If a given field isn't annotated with MigrationTransient
